mobs.long_desc: A momma coyote is very upset with you.
mobs.desc: This muscular, battle-hardened coyote is none too pleased with your intrusion into her den.  Her teeth are as sharp as razors, and it appears she has a litter of pups to feed.  She emits a low growl, as drool drips from her jaw. Her glowing green eyes peer at you through the darkness.

mobs.long_desc: A coyote pup wiggles here, newly born.
mobs.desc: How cute, this little fella must have been born just a few days ago.  His eyes are barely open he just lies here totally vulnerable.

mobs.long_desc: The captain of the guard proudly stands here.
mobs.desc: Highly decorated and well trained in battle, this guard has earned the rank of captain through years of service to the King and Queen and to the MeerCat people.  He stands slightly taller then the rest of the MeerCat guards.  His tan coat is dirty and shows signs of many wounds and scars, but it also shows some bulging muscles.  He looks friendly enough.

mobs.long_desc: A guard stands here at attention.
mobs.desc: This small MeerCat is single minded in the protection of his people.  His coat is somewhat darker than the captains coat, and he looks much younger.  But there is an undeniable fierceness in his eyes.

mobs.long_desc: A bloodthirsty tick waits here for its prey.
mobs.desc: Hiding in the thick scrub and brush, this hideous, black bloodsucker waits in silence to ambush an unsuspecting victim.

mobs.long_desc: A brown furry field mouse scampers about here.
mobs.desc: This mouse, about the size of a small rabbit, blends in well with the surroundings.  It has light brown colored fur, and rather large rounded ears making it's hearing very acute.  It is also very fast, and it tries to avoid danger as best it can.

mobs.long_desc: A gila monster rests here soaking up the sun.
mobs.desc: This lizard's black, scaly skin is covered with yellow and orange tubercles. It stands only about a foot tall but it is almost three feet in length.  It has sharp teeth and quite a poisonous bite.

mobs.keywords: cat young female impressive meer cat princess girl
mobs.long_desc: An impressive, young, female meer cat walks by you.
mobs.desc: She stands very upright, and carries herself with unmatched dignity.  Her fur is well groomed and without a speck of dirt.  She is well built and walks by you without as much as a glance.

mobs.short_desc: the King of the Meer Cats
mobs.long_desc: The King of the Meer Cats surveys his court.
mobs.desc: This robust, stately man is the uncontested leader of the Meer Cats.  He stands much taller than any of the other creatures you have seen in his domain.  He also has a very lightly colored coat, which seems to be of some significance in their culture.  He is broad and muscular, but has a benevolent look in his eyes.

mobs.long_desc: The meer cat Queen sits here on her throne.
mobs.desc: About 4 feet in height, this small creature is dressed more impressively than the creatures in this complex.  She is frail and delicate, and her posture is rigid.  She smiles at you; a kindness and warmth fills the room.

mobs.long_desc: A baby Meer Cat sits here, smiling brightly.
mobs.desc: This small, infant Meer Cat, no more than 1 foot tall, frolics without a care. It has the softest, fuzziest fur one can imagine, but sharp little teeth!

mobs.long_desc: A buzzard flies overheard looking for a meal.
mobs.desc: This very large scavenger bird likes to dine on the fruits of other creatures labor.  Its beak is as sharp as a razor and its neck muscles are not to be underestimated.  It dark feathers, thick with natural oils, shine in the sunlight.

mobs.long_desc: A brown snake slithers along the ground.
mobs.desc: This snake is over eight feet long, and feeds on the smaller Meercats.  Its scale covered skin is a perfect shade of brown, it blends in flawlessly with the earth and surrounding countryside.  It's pointy toungue 'tastes' the air, as it flickers in and out of the snakes mouth.

mobs.long_desc: A meer cat warrior stands here, ready for a fight.
mobs.desc: Her skin is covered with many scars from battle.  Her muscles bulge.  This creature is a finely trained killing machine.  With a single word from her commander she will gladly give her life for the meer cat people.

mobs.long_desc: A worker drags his dirty body along.
mobs.desc: Tremendously dirty and abused, this worker is finally going home to his family after a long day at work.  His body is covered in scars, and his coat is extremely dark-colored, stained with clumps of dirt.  He hangs his head low, and his eyes look very haggard.

mobs.long_desc: A brown coyote sniffs the air for the scent of a meer cat.
mobs.desc: This muscular relative of the dog has a viscious temperament.  Its keen sense of smell and strong pack instinct makes it a deadly enemy.  It has a dark brown pelt, and large dark eyes.  It sniffs the ground and air, hoping to catch scent of its prey.

mobs.keywords: guard off duty meer cat meercat
mobs.long_desc: An off-duty guard sits here enjoying his meal.
mobs.desc: This small MeerCat is single minded in the protection of his people.  His coat is somewhat darker then the captains coat, and he looks much younger.  But there is an undeniable fierceness in his eyes.

objects.ground: A key made with an intricate lattice work design rests here.

extras.text: This delicate little key looks as if it could crumble under the slightest pressure. It is beautiful.

objects.ground: A stunning handcarved fountain is here.

extras.text: Carved from a solid piece of white rock, this fountain is really out of place. It shows a single large MeerCat reared up on its hind legs looking around the area for danger.  There is an inscription on the side.

The inscription reads: To the MeerCat people, I owe my life to you. Although I can never hope to repay that debt, I hope this fountain will quench the thirst of you and your children for generations to come. I shall never forget your hospitality. -Beraak

objects.ground: A badge belonging to one of the guards has been dropped here.

extras.text: A small red badge with a picture of the MeerCat royal family stitched onto it.

objects.ground: A brown colored coyote pelt has been tossed here.

extras.text: This brown pelt looks as if it could impart the agility and vitality of its former owner.  It is well constructed and would offer some degree of protection against your foes.

objects.ground: Some snakeskin sits here in a tight coil.

extras.text: This belt is made from the skin of a feared indigenous species of snake renowned for the accuracy and damage of their strikes.

objects.ground: A buzzard's feather drifts lazily to the ground here.

extras.text: A dark feather from the powerful buzzard, these creatures are very well known for their strength, not their beauty.

objects.ground: A sharpened stick is stuck into the ground here.

extras.text: A very simply weapon, very easy to use.  If properly handled it could be a formidible weapon.

objects.ground: A pair of rough, scaley boots sits on the ground.

extras.text: The creatures that fashioned these boots let nothing go to waste.  These orange and yellow boots are very comfortable, you could walk all day in them.  The thick skin and durable construction, would also offer you a fair degree of protection in battle.

objects.ground: A thick branch of a tree is here, detached from its owner.

extras.text: A simple tree branch.  If you got hit with it, it would smart quite a bit. Maybe it could knock some sense into you.

objects.ground: A pair of coyote skin pants is here looking stylish.

extras.text: Stylish and functional too.  These pants will insulate the heat as well as the cold.  Now you have more of a reason to live!
A simple vest protects the vicera from, lets say, unwanted intrusion.  Its light construction also allows for easier and unhindered movement.

objects.ground: A small tooth with a post attached sits here in the dirt.

extras.text: This ivory colored white fang is as sharp as a pin.  This earring is a status symbol among the people who constructed it.

objects.ground: A small beeswax candle is here.

extras.text: A small candle fashioned from beeswax will light the path ahead.  It is protected from the wind by a thin glass covering.

triggers.name: captain trigger
triggers.commands: if (%direction% == south) say Greetings, %actor.name%.  Welcome to the Kingdom of the Meer Cats! say Are you a friend or a foe? elseif (%direction% == north) say Fare thee well, %actor.name%. endif

triggers.name: captain_guard_speak1
triggers.commands: say That is unacceptable! wait 1 kill %actor.name%

triggers.name: captain_guard_speak2
triggers.commands: say Very good! unlock trellis open trellis say Welcome to the Kingdom of the Meer Cats. bow %actor.name%

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Fine particles of dust cover everything, making all that is seen an orangy-tan color.  This small path however is well traveled, with many small tracks littering it.  Given the dusty, dry composition of the ground, they must have been made very recently.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Thick brush and scrub flank both sides of the path.  The tracks seem to be getting denser further down the trail.  Every now and again a strange creature can be heard barking in the distance.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Thick brush and scrub flank both sides of the path.  The tracks seem to be getting denser further down the trail.  Every now and again a strange creature can be heard barking in the distance.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Thick brush and scrub flank both sides of the path.  The tracks seem to be getting denser farther down the trail.  Every now and again a strange creature can be heard barking in the distance.  A little ways to the northwest, there seems to be a strange gate of some sorts.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: The path takes a strange and rather sudden turn to the east here, as if it were avoiding something.  At first glance there appears to be no reason for the change.  The thick scrub seems blocks any attempt to leave the path.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Thick brush and scrub flank both sides of the path.  The tracks seem to be far more numerous here than before.  Every now and again a strange creature can be heard barking in the distance.  A little ways to the northwest, there seems to be a strange gate of some sorts.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Thick brush and scrub flank both sides of the path.  The tracks seem to be far more numerous here than before.  Every now and again a strange creature can be heard barking in the distance.  A little ways to the northwest, there seems to be a strange gate of some sorts.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: The path here takes a sharp turn westwardly, and that gate can be better observed from this point.  A beautiful, albeit crude, path begins to the west. The creatures of this realm must be pretty resourceful to make such beauty come forth from such a barren land.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: The ground is slightly soggy, and a path runs east-west through the bushes. It seems to peter out to the east and become more distinct to the west.  It is impossible to see far due to the everpresent brush.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Beautiful flowers and low growing ivy start to line the path now.  There are also statues and busts here, although they are not very aesthetically pleasing. The are crudely crafted, as if done by children.  But, they all seem to be very well taken care of, some even with decoration like they are worshipped or honored.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Beautiful flowers and low growing ivy start to line the path now.  There are also statues and busts here, although they are not very aesthetically pleasing. The are crudely crafted, as if done by children.  But, they all seem to be very well taken care of, some even with decoration like they are worshipped or honored.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: Beautiful flowers and low growing ivy start to line the path now.  There are also statues and busts here, although they are not very aesthetically pleasing. The are crudely crafted, as if done by children.  But, they all seem to be very well taken care of, some even with decoration like they are worshipped or honored.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: How beautiful!  The sweet smell of honeysuckle and roses float lazily by, filling the mind with images that are almost dreamlike in nature.  To the north, an arched trellis is covered with a multitude of brightly colored flowers, most of which you have never seen.  The creatures that reside here are definitely talented in the art and science of horticulture.

rooms.name: The Gates of the Kingdom of the Meer Cats
rooms.description: Through the gates of the trellis a small complex of mounds can be seen. Many creatures can be seen darting to and fro, occasionally rearing up on their hind legs, scouring the horizon for danger.  The sounds coming from inside this compound slightly resemble barks, although it's tough to classify them one way or the other.

North.description: A beautiful arched wooden trellis is covered with various flowers.

extras.text: A beautiful arched wooden trellis is covered with various flowers.

rooms.name: A Coyote's Den
rooms.description: The strong smells of musk and urine fill this dark, cramped den.  Hundreds of bones, heavily gnawed, are strewn around the ground.  It is extremely difficult to see anything, but it is quite obvious that this den is not empty.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -Southwest
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is composed very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

South.description: A beautiful arched wooden trellis is covered with various flowers.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -West
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -West
rooms.description: Evenly spaced around the outskirts of this courtyard, four dirt mounds can be seen.  The are composed of solidly packed earth.  They look as though they can be easily scaled, and since there is no way around them, there doesn't seem to be much of a choice.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside can be fully appreciated.  Nearby to the east is the forest town of Mielikki.  To the east sits an open aired room, bustling with creatures.  Even from this distance the decoration of the open aired area seems more elaborate.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -West
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -West
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -Northwest
rooms.description: The path takes a sharp turn here.  A little ways from here, another dirt mound pokes high above the ground.  Very dense scrub and brush provides an effective 'fence' of sorts, keeping danger out.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -North
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -North
rooms.description: Evenly spaced around the outskirts of this courtyard, four dirt mounds can be seen.  The are composed of solidly packed earth.  They look as though they can be easily scaled, and since there is no way around them, there doesn't seem to be much of a choice.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside can be fully appreciated.  Nearby to the east is the forest town of Mielikki.  To the south sits an open aired room, bustling with creatures.  Even from this distance the decoration of the open aired area seems more elaborate.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -North
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -North
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -Northeast
rooms.description: The path takes a sharp turn here.  A little ways from here, another dirt mound pokes high above the ground.  Very dense scrub and brush provides an effective 'fence' of sorts, keeping danger out.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -East
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -East
rooms.description: Evenly spaced around the outskirts of this courtyard, four dirt mounds can be seen.  The are composed of solidly packed earth.  They look as though they can be easily scaled, and since there is no way around them, there doesn't seem to be much of a choice.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside can be fully appreciated.  Far to the south is the beautiful city of Anduin.  To the west sits an open aired room, bustling with creatures.  Even from this distance the decoration of the open aired area seems more elaborate.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -East
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -East
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -Southeast
rooms.description: The path takes a sharp turn here.  A little ways from here, another dirt mound pokes high above the ground.  Very dense scrub and brush provides an effective 'fence' of sorts, keeping danger out.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -South
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is comprised very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.description: Evenly spaced around the outskirts of this courtyard, four dirt mounds can be seen.  The are composed of solidly packed earth.  They look as though they can be easily scaled, and since there is no way around them, there doesn't seem to be much of a choice.

rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside can be fully appreciated.  Far to the south is the beautiful city of Anduin.  To the north sits an open aired room, bustling with creatures.  Even from this distance the decoration of the open aired area seems more elaborate.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -South
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is composed very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: Outer Courtyard -South
rooms.description: This outer path of the courtyard is composed very simply of dirt and small rocks.  The meer cat peoples are not masters of various and exotic technologies, but there is a subtle beauty to their world.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside come be fully appreciated.  Nearby to the east is the forest town of Mielikki.  Immediately to the east, a small hole sits surrounded by many tracks.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside come be fully appreciated.  Nearby to the east is the forest town of Mielikki.  Immediately to the south, a small hole sits surrounded by many tracks.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside come be fully appreciated.  Nearby to the east is the forest town of Mielikki.  Immediately to the west, a small hole sits surrounded by many tracks.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: High atop this dirt mound, the surrounding countryside come be fully appreciated.  Far to the south is the beautiful city of Anduin.  Immediately to the north, a small hole sits surrounded by many tracks.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: Twenty feet below lies a relatively decorated path that leads toward the center of this complex.  There also lies a small hole to the north that is inacessible from here.

rooms.name: The Court Promenade
rooms.description: Beautiful, small stones lines the path towards what appears to be an open aired court of some type.  There are many small creatures darting around in this court.  There is a sense of urgency in everyone, and everything.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Inner World of the Meer Cats
rooms.description: Many little tracks litter the ground.  A small hole in the ground here descends into the darkness below.  A small rack sits here, filled with what looks like sharpened sticks.  A rotted wooden sign sits here.

extras.text: It reads: All is quiet on all fronts. Enjoy the peace and prosperity brought to us by the king.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: Twenty feet below lies a relatively decorated path that leads toward the center of this complex.  There also lies a small hole to the east that is inacessible from here.

rooms.name: The Court Promenade
rooms.description: Beautiful, small stones lines the path towards what appears to be an open aired court of some type.  There are many small creatures darting around in this court.  There is a sense of urgency in everyone, and everything.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Inner World of the Meer Cats
rooms.description: A small hole in the ground here descends into the darkness below.  The ground here seems very heavily traveled.  A small stone wall, about three feet high, gives the impression that this is a fortification of some sorts.

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: Twenty feet below lies a relatively decorated path that leads toward the center of this complex.  There also lies a small hole to the south that is inacessible from here.

rooms.name: The Court Promenade
rooms.description: Beautiful, small stones lines the path towards what appears to be an open aired court of some type.  There are many small creatures darting around in the court.  There is a sense of urgency in everyone, and everything.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Inner World of the Meer Cats
rooms.description: A small hole in the ground here descends into the darkness below.  The ground here seems very heavily traveled.  There are two raised platforms, that would give one a commanding view of the city.  A small sign sits above the entrance to the hole.

extras.text: It reads: Next guard meeting 15:00. Next training-- day of the coyote, 06:00 Captain of the Guard

rooms.name: A Dirt Mound
rooms.description: Twenty feet below lies a relatively decorated path that leads toward the center of this complex.  There also lies a small hole to the north that is inacessible from here.

rooms.name: The Court Promenade
rooms.description: Beautiful, small stones lines the path towards what appears to be an open aired court of some type.  There are many small creatures darting around in the court.  There is a sense of urgency in everyone, and everything.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Inner World of the Meer Cats
rooms.description: A small hole in the ground here descends into the darkness below. Beautiful purple fabric lines three of the walls and a coarse tan colored fabric acts as a roof, giving it some insulation from the elements, which can be very extreme in this region.  A sign sits here, ornately decorated and golden in color.

extras.text: It reads: Residence of the King and Queen of the MeerCats, meetings by appointment only. NO Trespassing!!!

rooms.name: Entrance to the Warriors Barracks
rooms.description: The hides of many animals line the walls as the trophies of past victories. Many weapons and shields hang proudly on the walls as well.  Some of these items are prized war tools, others are trophies seized from enemies long dead and forgotten.

rooms.name: A Worker's Hovel
rooms.description: The conditions in this living space are extremely harsh.  A small reed or straw mat is on the ground, in the middle of the room.  A crudely constructed table with some loose parchment littered across it is here.  There is a small path that leads toward the west, which must be where the populace lives, but is is far too small to be entered.

rooms.name: The Guards' Dining Hall
rooms.description: This room contains very little decoration.  A small weapons rack and some racks with uniform-like clothing sit along the wall.  A large dining room table sits here with some fresh, hot food on it.  There is a path that extends away to the east, but it is far to small to enter.

rooms.name: The Royal Residence
rooms.description: Opulent purple tapestries line this beautiful, yet simply decorated room. A huge painting of the royal family hangs prominently on the wall.  Three carved chairs sit in the corner, one raised slightly higher then the other two. A passage way extends to the west, but it is far too small to be entered.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other then that the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: An Open-Aired Court
rooms.description: Crudely-cut stones pave the ground here in what seems to be a monument of some type.  In the center of the court sits a very attractive fountain with a statue on top.  Other than that, the surroundings are rather mundane.

rooms.name: MeerCat Court Fountain
rooms.description: The ground here is constructed of perfectly polished granite or something similar.  The ground is also spotless, the creatures of this realm must take great care in its upkeep.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: A path leads north.  Its southern end comes to an abrupt end here at a screen of trees, which obscures the lands to the south.  A narrow break leads through the trees.  A small wooden building lies off to the east.  No entrances are visible here.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: A dusty path leads through the woods here along the eastern flank of a low earthen ridge.  From the markings on the path, traffic would appear to be light.  The path continues north and south.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: This is the north end of a low earthen ridge.  A path leads south along it. At this point it turns east to avoid an impenetrable wood, for this is the middle of a forest.  A small building lies off in the distance to the southeast.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: This is a path of fine, dry, tan-colored dirt.  It leads east-west through the middle of a deep forest.  The path appears little-traveled but in good repair.

rooms.name: A Dry Dusty Path
rooms.description: A path runs through the forest here.  To the north, the trees seem to be thinning.  The path also continues west.  A very fine dirt blows about and coats everything, giving all seen an orange-tan blanket of earth.
